snippet.title: Valkyria Chronicles 3 - The Treacherous Valkyria [Selvaria] [DLC]
snippet.description:
Valkyria Chronicles 3
The Treacherous Valkyria:
Fight versus Selvaria
Year 1935
Mission: "Valkyria of the Border"
Objective: Defend special target; or, eliminate all enemy units.
Difficulty: ★★★★★
Weapon received: ゲルA (Gell-A?) (pistol)

After defeating the 3 Valkyrias another mission is unlocked. Who will be the final boss of this chapter?
